meanings.definition: Not amplified or increased in volume.
meanings.sent1: The unamplified sound of the bird chirping was gentle and soothing.
meanings.sent2: The unamplified music in the cafe created a relaxed atmosphere.
meanings.sent3: The unamplified whispers between the students during the test were surprisingly loud.
meanings.sent4: Her unamplified emotions spoke louder than any words could.
meanings.sent5: The unamplified beauty of the sunset painted the sky in soft hues.

meanings.sent1: The unamplified voice of the singer filled the room with raw emotion.
meanings.sent2: The unamplified colors of the painting gave it a subtle charm.
meanings.sent3: The unamplified protest was peaceful yet powerful.
meanings.sent4: His unamplified determination carried him through difficult times.
meanings.sent5: The unamplified aroma of freshly baked bread wafted through the kitchen.

meanings.sent1: Her unamplified storytelling captivated the audience with its simplicity.
meanings.sent2: The unamplified details in the report gave a clear picture of the situation.
meanings.sent3: The unamplified joke made everyone chuckle at its straightforward humor.
meanings.sent4: His unamplified talent shone brightly in the small town.
meanings.sent5: The unamplified truth cut through the lies like a sharp knife.
